Features.title: Goals
Features.text: Set and manage your personal goals to keep track of your progress and stay motivated

Features.title: Stopwatch
Features.text: Use the built-in stopwatch to accurately track the time spent on your tasks and projects.

Features.title: Calendar
Features.text: Organize your schedule and review your time entries with the integrated calendar view.

Features.title: Charts
Features.text: Visualize your productivity trends with dynamic charts that summarize your weekly, monthly, and yearly performance.
